backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization and storage mixins and comprehensive types plus comparison utilities for residents and related entities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries, each detailing feature goals, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend files, summarizing their roles, features, and recent behavior changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Main production deployment guide outlining verification steps, deployment methods, logging, and rollback procedures.
frontend/deployment_logs/.gitkeep: Placeholder file documenting that the directory stores timestamped deployment logs and canister ID artifacts.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Historical deployment checklist for Version 89 with instructions for building, deploying, and performing smoke tests.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file initializing the frontend root and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/public/build-meta.json: Template metadata file overwritten during deployment with version, commit, and timestamp data.
frontend/scripts/clean_redeploy_producti: Script that performs a clean frontend rebuild, injects build metadata, and redeploys to production with logging.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Historical script for retrying a version‑89‑specific publish-only deployment to the IC.
frontend/scripts/post_deploy_smoke_test_: Interactive script guiding operators through post-deployment smoke tests and verifying deployment artifacts.
frontend/scripts/redeploy_production.sh: Script that rebuilds the frontend with metadata and redeploys it to production, logging canister IDs and repo state.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: Detailed smoke test plan for Version 89 covering authentication, dashboard behavior, UI checks, and error monitoring.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app sets up routing, identity, actor loading, and multi-stage startup health checks with timeouts and fallback screens.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for creating an ADL record, validating fields and submitting via useAddAdlRecord.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog to record daily vitals with date/time parsing, temperature unit handling, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog for adding a MAR entry, selecting active medications, converting date/time, and submitting via useAddMarRecord.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Dialog for adding a medication to a resident, including dosage, route, schedule, and physician matching.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large admin-only form for creating residents, handling basic info plus lists of physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons. Manages extensive local state and submits mapped values to backend.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog for adding a weight entry to a resident, validating required fields and submitting measurement data to the backend. Includes simple form state and reset logic.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the app’s logo with size and mode options and provides a text fallback if the image fails to load. Uses asset URL resolution and minimal state.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsIndic: Shows build metadata and backend canister ID with fallbacks and warning indicators when information is missing. Uses tooltips and runtime checks for build diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Form dialog for editing an existing medication with pre-filled values, supporting route, quantity, prescribing physician lookup, and status updates. Submits updated fields to backend with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Comprehensive admin-only editor for all resident details with pre-filled data and multi-section editing for physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons. Converts form values to backend formats and updates the resident record.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component letting users enter and save name and employee ID using a startup-safe profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays startup errors with diagnostics, error details, and retry/logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines startup-safe and normal user profile queries and mutations using actor/resilient‑actor hooks with timeout and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates a timeout-protected actor with optional admin initialization and surfaces errors for controlled retry behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, dialog overrides, and extensive print styles.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides timeout wrapping, canister error detection, and error normalization helpers for backend communication.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds base-path-safe asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL with normalization to avoid double slashes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Retrieves build metadata from env vars or a fallback file and generates build identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts dates to/from nanoseconds and provides formatting and age calculation utilities using UTC-safe logic.
frontend/src/lib/residentEnumMapping.ts: Maps room type and resident status enums between backend values and frontend string representations.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Derives backend environment diagnostics and performs a health check via the public backend endpoint.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines centralized timeout constants for various startup and backend interaction operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing active and discharged residents with admin actions, query-driven data loading, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity authentication and displays a styled login card with branding.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Resident profile page that loads resident data, supports admin editing actions, and displays detailed info across tabs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, known issues, and feature requests for fixing dashboard loading behavior.
